hints.content:
All of the rectangles show $\dfrac45$ shaded.  

However, for two fractions to be equivalent, they must refer to the same size whole.
Which answer choice shows $\dfrac45$ of the same size wholes shaded?

This pair of rectangles shows equivalent areas shaded:



[[☃ image 1]]

$=$

[[☃ image 2]]

options.alt: Two rectangles that are the same size. There is an equal sign between the rectangles. Both rectangles are divided into 5 equal parts. In each rectangle, 4 parts are shaded. !
Two rectangles that are the same size. There is an equal sign between the rectangles. Both rectangles are divided into 5 equal parts. In each rectangle, 4 parts are shaded. !

question.content:
**Which pair of rectangles have equivalent areas shaded?**


[[☃ radio 1]]
